thread.title: Foo Fighters to play for fans in Italy - WGAL-TV Lancaster
thread.title_full: Foo Fighters to play for fans in Italy - WGAL-TV Lancaster - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: WGAL-TV Lancaster
title: Foo Fighters to play for fans in Italy - WGAL-TV Lancaster
text:
Foo Fighters lovers in Italy who banded together to perform an impressive rendition of the song "Learn to Fly" featuring 1,000 musicians will finally get their wish. Lead singer Dave Grohl announced Thursday that the band will play a show on November 3 at the Carisport venue in Cesena -- bringing to reality a dream that organizer Fabio Zaffagnini set in motion last year by putting out a call for hundreds of guitarists, drummers, bassists and singers to perform this summer in unison and film a version of the hit song.
 WGAL-TV Lancaster.
